misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The cipher algorithm "AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding" is not secure because it uses a block mode of operation (CBC) which is vulnerable to padding oracle attacks.
recommendation: Use a secure cipher algorithm, such as "AES/GCM/NoPadding" or "AES/CTR/NoPadding".
